definition: snarled or stalled in complete confusion, an acronym often used by soldiers in World War II: situation normal all fucked up, cause to be in a state of complete confusion
details:
adjective
- snarled or stalled in complete confusion
= synonyms: fucked-up
noun
- an acronym often used by soldiers in World War II: situation normal all fucked up
verb
- cause to be in a state of complete confusion
